title: GEEK LIGHTING Polo Shirts for Men Short Sleeve Summer Causal Collared Golf Tennis T-Shirt
description: PERFORMANCE FABRIC: This mens short sleeve polo shirt is made of moisture wicking performance fabric with polyester/spandex. It's lightweight, breathable, soft, moisture-wicking, UPF 30+, 4-way stretch for added overall comfort. It is comfortable and cool on skin

EXQUISITE FEATURES: The golf collared shirt's collar cuff and hem have contrasting color design, making the whole polo distinctive, classic and elegant. The hem has a split design. The polo shirts are long enough to be tucked into trousers

ALL-DAY COMFORT: The mens moisture wicking shirt's material is soft, the stitching is solid, and the fit is just about right. It is very breathable and will provide ample cooling effect on a hot weather

OCCASIONS: This mens summer shirts is versatile and can be worn in a variety of settings. It is a great travel shirt as it folds up conveniently and does not wrinkle. It also great for a day of daily work, casual wear, office or any outdoor sport activities, like golf, tennis, bowling . A optimal gift for families, friends or boyfriends
WASH TIP: Machine washable, anti-fading, anti-pilling, no bleaching, no wrinkled, no shrink. Regular US size, runs true to size
